title: Player Unknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)
description: PUBG is a battle royale game where players fight for survival on dynamic maps. Land, loot, and outlast your opponents in this intense multiplayer experience.

title: Fortnite
description: Fortnite is a free-to-play battle royale game with building mechanics. Drop into the action, build structures, and fight to be the last one standing.

title: Rocket League
description: Rocket League combines soccer with rocket-powered cars. Score goals and perform amazing aerial shots in this unique sports game.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Genshin Impact is an open-world action RPG. Explore Teyvat, fight enemies, and uncover the mysteries of this beautiful world.

title: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a fast-paced battle royale game. Choose your Legend, master your abilities, and fight for victory.

title: League of Legends
description: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena game. Choose your champion and fight in 5v5 matches.

title: VALORANT
description: VALORANT is a tactical 5v5 FPS game. Use unique abilities and precise gunplay to outplay your opponents.

title: Among Us
description: Among Us is a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal. Complete tasks or sabotage the crew as the imposter.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a sandbox game where you can build, explore, and survive in a blocky world.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world RPG set in Night City. Live as a mercenary and make choices that shape the story.
